== Armor stand ==
Note: To make the animation the exact same as the armor stand version of the animation for the armor stand animations you have to use a molang query so that the animation does not fade out, Ex. instead of putting <code>a 9999</code> at the end of the /playanimation command just put <code>a 0 "aaaa == 1.0"</code> instead. (You will have to run another animation with the same animation controller to stop it though. )
